name: Living Fortresses
description: Living Fortresses is a twin stick shooter/hack n' slash hybrid where you face off against skyscraper-sized alien robots. The game features full freedom of movement and combat strategy. This project is in early development, but my plans for the final game include a wide array of fortresses and a deep combat system with different options and upgrades. In the meantime, enjoy this brief window to the game in the form of the first boss' legs.
